venue.address_1: Corner of Route 20 and Prospect Street
venue.name: Chuck's Restaurant

item.description: Trivia is held at Chuck's Restaurant in Auburn every Thursday night. Each team is comprised of roughly six members. An emcee reads the questions, and the team then submits an answer, bidding a certain number of points each time. The team with the most points in the end wins.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a small meetup sign. Also, closer to the event I will give out my cell number
item.name: Trivia at Chuck's
